title: Masters + Decay working?
body:
Recently, there was an update that changed the decay rules for Masters + players. Is it working as intended? When I hover over my rank, it tells me I have 10 days until decay. It has said 10 days for the last 2 days now and hasn't gone down. So my question is, is it actually stuck at 10 days, or have I already started running out of days and just don't know it yet? I don't want to get hit with a random 100 LP decay.

Another thing about it. If I go to my own profile, it says that I have 10 days until I decay. However, if I get on another account and click on my main's profile, it says that I have 0 days until decay.

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up on this!  We're actually aware of this, and it appears to be a visual issue.  We have a support note on it [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227022368--Sept-8-Master-Challenger-profiles-currently-show-all-players-the-message-You-will-decay-in-0-days-This-is-a-visual-bug-These-players-are-in-no-danger-of-decay-).  Viewing your own profile should show the correct days.  Hope that helps!
